name: Super Mazado FULL
description:
Meet Mr Mazado, a lone man bent on surviving the horrors of a new world he has stumbled upon. In order for his survival, he will certainly need to find some meaningful aids to assist. 

Controls: Arrow keys and space bar to use ray blaster.

Power-ups

When you grab glide feathers, jump and hold the up arrow to glide down gently. Not perfect but has worked. 

Ray blaster

Use this to shoot enemies close by, either individually or at groups of them.

Eugenic formula (SPECIAL)

This power up will grant you enhanced jumping, running and being able to take additional hits while transforming you into a furry feline taur.

As for everything else, the rest is up to you to discover... Enjoy! :)
